code: app.get("/bookings",(req,res)=>{db.query("SELECT * FROM bookings",(err,results)=>{if(err)return res.status(500).send(err);res.json(results);});});app.post("/bookings",(req,res)=>{const{name,date}=req.body;db.query("INSERT INTO bookings (name, date) VALUES (?, ?)",[name,date],err=>{if(err)return res.status(500).send(err);res.sendStatus(201);});});
